entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Burgeo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:02 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burgeo 12:30 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: 3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 2.2°C
Wind: ENE 41 km/h gust 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or drizzle. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain or drizzle. Fog developing early this evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 near midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog becoming fog patches near noon. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023
